markdownRemark.html: It’s difficult to build in time for brainstorming and connecting with others. It’s made harder when working alone, and the pandemic has exasperated the conditions. Find time to spend on ideas and connections because they can add meaning to the day, give optimism, and get outside silos.

frontmatter.description: It's difficult to build in time for brainstorming and connecting with others. It's made harder when working alone, and the pandemic has exasperated the conditions.
frontmatter.title: Ideas and connections
